alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 1:24PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause wind damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 AM Wednesday: Jacob Lake 5 to 9 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
